ratings.comment: Haya is honestly one of my favorite people. She has had me since about the first day I started at this university. She's happy to answer questions, even about her and her life. You'll really get to know her in 201, when the class is structured differently. She's hilarious and like a mother figure. I am sad to know she won't be my professor come 301

Haya is a great professor. She makes sure that you understand the material and is 100% committed to your success as a student. The class itself can be a lot of work, but just don't fall behind and you should get an A

Haya was a good Hebrew teacher. I was not Jewish or in anyway familiar with the Hebrew language. She expects you to work hard during the week with textbook exercises, vocab, language lab and dialogues, but the work is fair. With good attendance and honest effort, you will receive a good grade in this class.

Haya is a nice lady and a good Hebrew teacher. If you put in the work, which is sometimes annoying, you will get an A. She is easy to talk to if you have a problem and you can definitely miss a couple classes. The only thing bad was that the power hebrew classes were hard to sit through. Otherwise, a pretty good teacher.

Haya is such a sweet lady. She is just so nice and fun-loving and laid back. Some of the things she says and does are just so goofy and awkward and you cannot help but laugh. Literally, she puts the class into hysterics half the time. Pretty easy  class and she really just wants you to get an A. such a lovable lady. perfect 101 teacher

I LOVE haya. She's so sweet and makes me laugh every day! she's extremely helpful- ask questions in class, and she'll really give you attention if you stop by her office hours. she's really dedicated and cares about her students doing well! i wish i could have her every semester, but after this coming semester, i'll have taken all of her classes.

haya is the BEST! in fact, im taking 203 with her fall semester.  shes the best.  shes so nice and shes always willing to help you if you're having trouble.  shes so sweet and shes made me love hebrew!
Haya is a wonderful teacher and makes Hebrew enjoyable to learn!
Haya is awesome. Very easy to get a good grade in her class while still learning all you need to go on to the next level of Hebrew. She's the best foreign language prof. I've had.
I am obsessed with Haya!  She is a wonderful professor who loves to teach and is talented at it.  I just wish I was still in school so that I could continue learning Hebrew from her.

Haya is a great teacher who treats her students like her children.  Fun class, and she uses guilt trip pressure, but if you get your work done you will be fine.  The way she grades lets you get an A or AB easy, and actually learn it.
